Instance Method# compactMap(_:)

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 6.0+

```
func compactMap<T>(_ transform: (Publishers.Sequence<Elements, Failure>.Output) -> T?) -> Publishers.Sequence<[T], Failure>
```

Available when `Elements` conforms to `Sequence` and `Failure` conforms to `Error`.## [See Also](/documentation/Combine/Publishers/Sequence/compactMap(_:)#see-also)
